PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-13362013-12-05,  ,  ,  TC,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Competency of Operators of Pleasure Craft Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the COMPETENCY OF OPERATORS OF PLEASURE CRAFT REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that all language in the Regulations is consistent in both official languages and provide clarity; (2) follow-up on comments, concerns and recommendations made by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations concerning the Regulations; and (3) make other minor amendments.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0234 Publication Date: 2013-12-18
AttachmentsAttachment
